data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 78,486 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Auckland.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Auckland, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Auckland, New Zealand, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Auckland will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Auckland, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the South Asian, Bengali-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Auckland, New Zealand.
Father, please give the church in the state of Auckland prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Auckland, New Zealand has a population of 444,100.

We estimate Auckland has 78,486 people who might know Jesus, 148,212 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 217,402 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Auckland, New Zealand a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
